channel.title: Project on Codebatik by Aditya
channel.description: Recent content in Project on Codebatik by Aditya

item.title: Story of Making Url-Shortener as My Side Project
item.description: A few months ago I was thinking about making a simple service that could help me escalate my skill on nodejs. Basicly the service is pretty simple, it’s called url-shortener. You just generate a short code and linking with the url, it is simple. That time actually I just thinking to make this simple app with expressing my contribution on open-source project, I never build an open-source project based on NodeJs before.
